sections.title: Group Leader (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Group Leader class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Group Leader)
sections.description: Group Leaders gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base proficiencies.

sections.title: Close Group ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Group Leader)
sections.description: Designates up to 3 + Charisma modifier allies as a group who must stay within 30 feet (60 feet at 7th level) to benefit from class abilities.

sections.title: Swift Traveler ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Group Leader)
sections.description: Increases overland travel speed by +10 feet (+20 feet at 6th level) for the Group Leader and allows group members to use her speed if better.

sections.title: Group Guardian ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Group Leader)
sections.description: When using aid another for group members, grants a +3 bonus instead of the normal +2 bonus.

sections.title: Group Defense ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Group Leader)
sections.description: Provides escalating morale bonuses on attack and damage rolls against creatures that threaten group members, starting at +1 and reaching +5 at 10th level.

sections.title: Teamwork Feat (Group Leader)
sections.description: Grants bonus teamwork feats at 2nd, 6th, and 10th levels, requiring the Group Leader to meet prerequisites.

sections.title: Sneak Attack (Group Leader)
sections.description: Functions like rogue sneak attack, dealing +1d6 extra damage every two levels (3rd, 6th, 9th), stacking with other sneak attack sources.

sections.title: Favored Community ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Group Leader)
sections.description: Provides bonuses to initiative and specific skills within chosen communities, safe rest locations, and prevents tracking, with additional communities selectable at higher levels.
